mapper.insert: insert into customer(customer_subject,customer_content,customer_date,user_id) values(#{customer_subject},#{customer_content},now(),(select user_id from user where id=#{id}))
mapper.select: select a.customer_id, a.customer_subject, a.customer_content, b.id, a.customer_date from customer as a join user as b on a.user_id=b.user_id order by a.customer_id desc
select a.customer_id, a.customer_subject, a.customer_content, b.id, a.customer_date from customer as a join user as b on a.user_id=b.user_id where a.customer_id=${no}

select a.customer_id, a.customer_subject, a.customer_content, b.id, a.customer_date from customer as a join user as b on a.user_id=b.user_id where a.customer_content like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') order by a.customer_id desc

select a.customer_id, a.customer_subject, a.customer_content, b.id, a.customer_date from customer as a join user as b on a.user_id=b.user_id where b.id like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') order by a.customer_id desc

select a.customer_id, a.customer_subject, a.customer_content, b.id, a.customer_date from customer as a join user as b on a.user_id=b.user_id where a.customer_subject like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') order by a.customer_id desc
